title: Math Equation Builder
description: An interactive game where players build and solve basic math equations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) by dragging and dropping numbers and operators onto a canvas. It includes levels of increasing difficulty, with hints and scoring. The game teaches fundamental math concepts through hands-on problem-solving, making it suitable for elementary students or as a refresher for adults. It features a clean UI with animations for correct/incorrect answers and a leaderboard for engagement.
